definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: The top leader of the militants in Swat, Maulana Fazlullah, is still at large.
sentences.chinese: 斯瓦特的塔利班头目之一法兹鲁拉仍然在逃。
